alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Major; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 7:59AM CDT until October 04 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 759 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Leedey, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taloga, Seiling, Camargo, Chester, Cestos, and Hucmac. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
